## More ships through the Bering strait

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

#| fig-caption: "All AIS-identified transits from 2010 through 2024 travelling through the Bering strait"
years<-2010:2024
AIS<-c(242, 239, 316, 344, 255, 452, 340, 360, 358, 477, 557, 555, 509, 681, 665)
bering_passages <- data.frame(year = years, passages = AIS)

bering_passages |>
  ggplot(aes( x = year, y = passages)) +
  geom_line(colour="blue") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(2010, 2024, 2)) +
  labs(x= "",
       y = "",
       caption = "All AIS-identified transits from 2010 through 2024 travelling through the Bering strait") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(axis.line.y = element_blank()) +
  theme(panel.grid.major.y = element_line(color = "grey80",
                                          size = 0.5))
```
